description: Protect GraphQL mutations and queries with Keycloak JWT and PDP authorization

config.payload: {{- $perm := .MatchContext.Header.Get "X-Graphql-Permission" -}}{{- $iss := .Extra.iss | default "" -}}{{- $tenant := "palika" -}}{{- if $iss -}}{{- $tenant = $iss | regexReplaceAll "^.*/realms/(.*)$" "$1" -}}{{- end -}}{"subject":"user:{{ print .Subject }}","resource":"graphql:{{ if $perm }}{{ $perm }}{{ else }}query{{ end }}","action":"{{ .MatchContext.Method }}","context":{"tenant":"{{ $tenant }}"}}

headers.X-User-ID: {{ if .Extra.user_id }}{{ print .Extra.user_id }}{{ else if .Extra.sub }}{{ print .Extra.sub }}{{ else }}{{ print .Subject }}{{ end }}
headers.X-Roles: {{ if .Extra.realm_access }}{{ $roles := index .Extra.realm_access "roles" }}{{ range $index, $role := $roles }}{{ if $index }},{{ end }}{{ $role }}{{ end }}{{ end }}
